document.docAuthor: Smith, Sarah M., Petrov, Alexander V. & Cognato, Anthony I.
document.masterDocTitle: Beetles (Coleoptera) of Peru: A Survey of the Families. Curculionidae: Scolytinae

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Beetles (Coleoptera) of Peru: A Survey of the Families. Curculionidae: Scolytinae

subSubSection.paragraph:
Junín : Perene River (Canan Eden vill.), 1,100 m , A. Petrov (APP–2); Satipo (Río Venado vill.),
1,100 –1,300 m
, A. Petrov (APP-2, MEFEIS-1, MSUC-1). Loreto : 70 km SW Iquitos to Nauta, 130 m , A. Petrov, window trap (APP–1) (Petrov and Mandelshtam 2009 ; Petrov and Flechtmann 2013; Petrov 2014a ).

Huánuco : 14 km S Tingo María, Cayumba vill., 780 m , A. Petrov (APP-1). Junín : Satipo, (Cuviriaki, Río Venado vill.),
1,100 –1,400 m
, A. Petrov (APP-112), Perene River (Canan Eden, Los Olivos, Santa Cruz vill.), 960–1,100 m , A. Petrov (APP-87). Loreto : Iquitos (Itaya River), Mayna (Tanshiyaku vill.), Momon River (Gen Gen vill.), Nauta (Buen Fin vill.), 130 m , A. Petrov (Petrov and Mandelshtam 2009 ; Petrov and Flechtmann 2013; Petrov 2014a ). Madre de Dios : Los Amigos Biological Station, S12°24′9″ W70°6′40″ , 270 m , Smith and Hulcr coll., ex. ethanol trap (MSUC-2).

Junín : Perene River (Canan Eden vill.), 1,100 m , A. Petrov (APP-4); Satipo (Cuviriaki and Río Venado vill.),
1,100 –1,300 m
, A. Petrov, ex. Protium sp., Theoboma cacao ( Malvaceae ), in galleries of
Taurodemus
(APP-28). Loreto : Iquitos (Itaya River), Mayna (Tanshiyaku vill.), Momon River (Gen Gen vill.), 120–130 m , A. Petrov; (APP-4) (Petrov and Mandelshtam 2009 ; Petrov and Flechtmann 2013; Petrov 2014a ). Madre de Dios : Los Amigos Biological Station, S12°24′9″ W70°6′40″ , 270 m , Smith and Hulcr coll., ex. ethanol trap (MSUC-1).

Sampsonius kuaizi Petrov and Mandelshtam, 2009
Loreto : Iquitos to Nauta ( Itaya River ),
120– 130 m
, A. Petrov ( Petrov and Mandelshtam 2009 ; Petrov and Flechtmann 2013)
.

Sampsonius lapidosus Petrov and Flechtmann, 2013
Junín : Satipo ( Río Venado and Cuviriaki vill.),
1,100 m
, A. Petrov ( Petrov and Flechtmann 2013; Petrov 2014a )
.

Junín : Perene River (Canan Eden vill.), 1,100 m , A. Petrov (APP-1). Loreto : Iquitos to Nauta (Itaya River), 120–130 m , A. Petrov (Petrov and Mandelshtam 2009 ); Petrov and Flechtmann 2013; Petrov 2014a ). Madre de Dios : Los Amigos Biological Station, S12°24′9″ W70°6′40″ , 270 m , Smith and Hulcr coll., sample Cecropia 1 (MSUC-26).

Junín : Perene River ( Canan Eden vill.),
1,100 m
, A. Petrov ; Satipo ( Río Venado vill.),
1,100– 1,300 m
, A. Petrov (APP-2)
.
Loreto : Iquitos to Nauta ( Itaya River ),
120–130 m
, A. Petrov ( Petrov and Flechtmann 2013; Petrov 2014a )
.

Sampsonius prolongatus Schönherr, 1994
Loreto : Iquitos to Nauta (Itaya River), 120– 130 m , A. Petrov (Petrov and Mandelshtam 2009 ; Petrov and Flechtmann 2013; Petrov 2014a ). Madre de Dios : CICRA field station, exp. plot, north transect S12.55261° W70.11008° , 295 m , Chaboo team, ex. flight intercept trap (SEMC–1).

Junín : Perene River (Canan Eden vill.), 1,100 m , A. Petrov; Satipo (Río Venado vill.),
1,100 – 1,300 m
, A. Petrov (APP–8). Loreto : Iquitos to Nauta (Itaya River), 120–130 m , A. Petrov (Petrov and Mandelshtam 2009 ; Petrov and Flechtmann 2013; Petrov 2014a ).

Junín : Perene River (Canan Eden vill.), 1,100 m , A. Petrov (APP-1); Satipo (Río Venado vill.),
1,100 –1,300 m
, A. Petrov (APP-12); Loreto : Iquitos to Nauta (Itaya River), 120– 130 m , A. Petrov (APP-6); Momon River (Punto Alegre), 109 m , A. Petrov (APP-1) (Petrov and Mandelshtam 2009 ; Petrov and Flechtmann 2013; Petrov 2014a ). Madre de Dios : Los Amigos Biological Station, S12°24′9″ W70°6′ 40″ , 270 m , Smith and Hulcr coll., sample Virola 3b, ex. 4 cm diameter branch (MSUC-4).

Junín : Satipo ( Río Venado vill.),
1,100–1,300 m
, A. Petrov ( Petrov and Flechtmann 2013; Petrov 2014a )
.
